<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-hasher"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-hasher/#aaa11e9ae4d9d703ea31f2232d3416e0e"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-hasher/#aaa11e9ae4d9d703ea31f2232d3416e0e">key</a>&#91;8&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-hasher/#adb4ab3cf6dcc035250a2f81f2ab75e0e"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-chunk-state">llvm&#95;blake3&#95;chunk&#95;state</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-hasher/#adb4ab3cf6dcc035250a2f81f2ab75e0e">chunk</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-hasher/#a0aec85029a3693bce7dfebed7999d279"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-hasher/#a0aec85029a3693bce7dfebed7999d279">cv&#95;stack&#95;len</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The stack size is MAX&#95;DEPTH + 1 because we do lazy merging. For example,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with 7 chunks, we have 3 entries in the stack. Adding an 8th chunk</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// requires a 4th entry, rather than merging everything down to 1, because we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// don&#39;t know whether more input is coming. This is different from how the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reference implementation does things.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-hasher/#ad05b308789459f5131d149a4caacc0d6"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-hasher/#ad05b308789459f5131d149a4caacc0d6">cv&#95;stack</a>&#91;(<a href="#ab16d20f7cf5cddbaad0beb71b8313f89">LLVM&#95;BLAKE3&#95;MAX&#95;DEPTH</a> + 1) &#42; <a href="#a9a7048b8a78d415916d028f4b8477cc3">LLVM&#95;BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm-blake3-hasher">llvm&#95;blake3&#95;hasher</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
